skills.name: Config Principles
skills.pattern: 12-factor: store config in environment, not code

skills.name: Config Sources
skills.pattern: Environment vars, files, remote config, secrets managers

skills.name: Config Precedence
skills.pattern: CLI args > env vars > config file > defaults

skills.name: Environment Variables
skills.pattern: process.env.DATABASE_URL, dotenv for local dev

skills.name: dotenv
skills.pattern: .env, .env.local, .env.production, don't commit secrets

skills.name: Per-Environment Config
skills.pattern: Development, staging, production configs, feature flags

skills.name: Config File Formats
skills.pattern: JSON, YAML, TOML, INI, environment-specific files

skills.name: Config Validation
skills.pattern: Schema validation, fail fast on invalid config

skills.name: Config Libraries
skills.pattern: node-config, convict, dotenv, cosmiconfig

skills.name: Secret Management
skills.pattern: Never commit secrets, use secret managers, rotate regularly

skills.name: HashiCorp Vault
skills.pattern: Dynamic secrets, encryption, access policies, audit log

skills.name: AWS Secrets Manager
skills.pattern: Store secrets, automatic rotation, IAM access control

skills.name: AWS Parameter Store
skills.pattern: Hierarchical config, SecureString for secrets, versioning

skills.name: Environment Injection
skills.pattern: Inject secrets at deploy time, not build time

skills.name: ConfigMaps
skills.pattern: Non-sensitive config, mount as files or env vars

skills.name: K8s Secrets
skills.pattern: Base64 encoded, mount as files, external secrets operator

skills.name: External Secrets
skills.pattern: External Secrets Operator, sync from Vault/AWS to K8s

skills.name: Remote Config
skills.pattern: Change config without deploy, feature flags, A/B testing

skills.name: Config Servers
skills.pattern: Spring Cloud Config, Consul, etcd

skills.name: Hot Reload
skills.pattern: Watch for changes, reload without restart

skills.name: GitOps Config
skills.pattern: Config in Git, PR for changes, audit trail

skills.name: Sealed Secrets
skills.pattern: Encrypt secrets for Git storage, decrypt in cluster

skills.name: SOPS
skills.pattern: Encrypt files with KMS/PGP, decrypt at runtime

skills.name: Config as Code
skills.pattern: Treat config like code, review, test, version

skills.name: Immutable Config
skills.pattern: Config set at deploy, restart to change

skills.name: Feature Toggles
skills.pattern: Enable/disable features via config, gradual rollout

skills.name: Secret Rotation
skills.pattern: Automated rotation, zero-downtime rotation

skills.name: Least Privilege
skills.pattern: Only access needed secrets, scoped permissions

skills.name: Audit Logging
skills.pattern: Log secret access, detect anomalies, compliance

skills.name: Config Testing
skills.pattern: Test different configs, mock external config, dry run
